# backgroundStyle

**Instance Property**

The preferred background style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundStyle: UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle { get set }
```

## Customizing the background style

- **UIPageControl.BackgroundStyle**: Constants that define the background styles of the page control.
